title: Bloomberg Markets: Levin Says U.S. Has Bad Cyber Defense
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Levin Says U.S. Has Bad Cyber Defense
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Adam Levin Chairman and Founder CyberScout Discussing the fallout of global ransomware attack and how what the U.S. government needs to do to protect Americans.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
